types:type.name: inp
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type inp = Array<{| DESIGNATION: String, EMPLOYEEID: String, EMPLOYEENAME: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"DESIGNATION\\\":\\\"SSE\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEEID\\\":\\\"123\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEENAME\\\":\\\"GOPI\\\"},{\\\"DESIGNATION\\\":\\\"SSE\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEEID\\\":\\\"3456\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEENAME\\\":\\\"John\\\"},{\\\"DESIGNATION\\\":\\\"SSE\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEEID\\\":\\\"34543\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEENAME\\\":\\\"Aaron\\\"},{\\\"DESIGNATION\\\":\\\"SE\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEEID\\\":\\\"34543\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEENAME\\\":\\\"casey\\\"},{\\\"DESIGNATION\\\":\\\"BA\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEEID\\\":\\\"1\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEENAME\\\":\\\"Tom Berry\\\"},{\\\"DESIGNATION\\\":\\\"BA\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEEID\\\":\\\"1\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEENAME\\\":\\\"Tom Berry\\\"},{\\\"DESIGNATION\\\":\\\"BA\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEEID\\\":\\\"456\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEENAME\\\":\\\"Tom\\\"},{\\\"DESIGNATION\\\":\\\"SSE\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEEID\\\":\\\"6783\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEENAME\\\":\\\"CHAND\\\"},{\\\"DESIGNATION\\\":\\\"[SSE, SSE]\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEEID\\\":\\\"[6784, 6785]\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEENAME\\\":\\\"[Cdjks, CHskld]\\\"},{\\\"DESIGNATION\\\":\\\"SSE\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEEID\\\":\\\"6783\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEENAME\\\":\\\"CHAND\\\"},{\\\"DESIGNATION\\\":\\\"SSE\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEEID\\\":\\\"6783\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEENAME\\\":\\\"CHAND\\\"},{\\\"DESIGNATION\\\":\\\"SSE\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEEID\\\":\\\"6783\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEENAME\\\":\\\"CHAND\\\"},{\\\"DESIGNATION\\\":\\\"SSE\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEEID\\\":\\\"6789\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEENAME\\\":\\\"CHAND\\\"},{\\\"DESIGNATION\\\":\\\"SSE\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEEID\\\":\\\"6789\\\",\\\"EMPLOYEENAME\\\":\\\"CHAND\\\"}]"}

types:type.name: out
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type out = Array<{| empdesignation: String, empid: String, empname: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"empdesignation\\\":\\\"SSE\\\",\\\"empid\\\":\\\"123\\\",\\\"empname\\\":\\\"GOPI\\\"},{\\\"empdesignation\\\":\\\"SSE\\\",\\\"empid\\\":\\\"125\\\",\\\"empname\\\":\\\"GOPI\\\"},{\\\"empdesignation\\\":\\\"SSE\\\",\\\"empid\\\":\\\"124\\\",\\\"empname\\\":\\\"GOPI\\\"}]"}
